Text: O̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta ku Joash, o̩ma Ahazaya, jʼonu Juda, Jihoahaz, o̩ma Jihiu, chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l, Samaria; i je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwebie.
I ño̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, oñ i tʼadure Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, ubi; owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩; i kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo abʼIsrae̩l ma, oñ i mʼuma ko nyʼo̩wo̩ Hazae̩l, onu Siria, kpʼef o̩wo̩ Be̩n-hedad, o̩ma Hazae̩l o̩jo̩ du.
Taku Jihoahaz gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa, oñ Jihofa netirʼu; todu i cheli ku ma fʼabo Israe̩l de mʼane̩, alu kʼonu Siria fʼuma demane̩.
(Taku Jihofa mʼe̩najadu du ñw abo Israe̩l, abe̩le̩ ma kwef o̩wo̩ abo Siria tane̩; tak amo̩ma Israe̩l, kwogugu ef unyabo-ma dab igbele.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma kwo bʼadure abo unyi Je̩ro̩boam te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩, chai elule̩ ma kwolule̩ ef uwñ; Ashe̩ra laño̩ bo̩ Samaria ta.)

Todu i tʼamone̩ no̩ ñwu Jihoahaz in, chai amananya ooje, kpai o̩kogu me̩gwa kpʼabo ogu ku ma lule̩ e̩re̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa; todu onu Siria fʼuma kpa rinyo̩, i che ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼebutu ku ma kpetili mʼane̩.
E̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jihoahaz che, e̩wñ du kʼi che, kpʼukpahiu-wñ, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Taku Jihoahaz cholu manyʼamata-wñ; oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria. Taku Joash o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji owñ.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke mebie ku Joash jʼonu Juda, Jihoash o̩ma Jihoahaz le̩ jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria. I je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa.
I la nʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa ache; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, du te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure; i la talule̩ ef uwñ.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Joash che, e̩wñ du kʼi che, kpai ukpahiu-wñ kʼi du jogu kpʼAmazaya, onu Juda, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada lko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Oñ Joash cholu manyʼamata-wñ; taku Je̩ro̩boam gugu oj ede-wñ; oñ ma du Joash ji Samaria manyʼamonu Israe̩l.
E̩gbale̩ o̩ga ki adu E̩laisha kpa lewʼo̩la-wñ me̩; taku Joash, onu Israe̩l gwo̩ru wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i raku abʼo ma, i kakini, Ata-mi, Ata-mi, o̩kogu Israe̩l kpai amananya-wñ ge̩!
Tak E̩laisha ka ñw u kakini, Mʼo̩o̩do̩ kpai o̩fa ko; oñ i mʼo̩o̩do̩ kpai o̩fa ko.
Tak i ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ du dʼoo̩do̩; oñ i dʼo̩wo̩ dʼo. Tak E̩laisha kʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoj o̩wo̩ onu.

Oñ i kakini, Mʼope o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩ bi; tak i mʼu bi. Tak E̩laisha kakini, Tʼo̩fa; oñ i fʼu ta. Tak i kakini, O̩fa ujadu e-Jihofa le̩ de̩, owñ chʼo̩fa e-ujadu ugbo abo Siria; todu uwe̩ agwʼabo Siria dajane̩ Afe̩k, gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
Tak i kakini, Mʼo̩fa le̩ ko; tak i mʼu ko. Oñ i ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Gwo ane̩pe̩te̩; i la gwo onu me̩ta, tak i we.

Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ we̩do̩ rʼu, oñ i kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼe̩ ma gwo onu me̩lu abe̩k e̩fa; tak uwe̩ ma fʼabo Siria gwodajane̩ gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma lie̩ kpa; fa-i uwe̩ la agwo abo Siria dajane̩ onu me̩ta tete.
Oñ E̩laisha leku, ma la mʼu du ji. Tak udala udala abo Moab lewa fʼane̩ kpo̩fo̩ e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ etito̩ muda ababa.

Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma nʼoku one̩ aji, go, ma fʼabo udalaʼka li; taku ma mʼoku e̩ne̩ le̩ duro̩ tef oji E̩laisha; oñ abu kʼoku e̩ne̩ le̩ kado achiku E̩laisha ababa i mudaji, oñ i mʼe̩re̩ ko dʼane̩, i kwane̩ dago.
Hazae̩l, onu Siria le̩, la fʼabo Israe̩l demane̩ okpanachi Jihoahaz chaka.
Jihofa muda li uma eju oñ i chejumomi ma, i la dʼeju wo̩ ma, tod alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b, oñ i ko̩ efʼuma chile̩che̩, i la ko ma rikpolo bʼeju-wñ te̩ ta n.
Taku Hazae̩l, onu Siria, leku; oñ Be̩n-hedad, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji owñ.
Taku Jihoash, o̩ma Jihoahaz, dabi bo̩ Be̩n-hedad o̩ma Hazae̩l gba ewo ewo le̩, owñ chʼewo ewo ku Hazae̩l bo̩ Jihoahaz ata-wñ gba ef ogu. Onu me̩ta Joash kpʼo̩, oñ i dabi gba ewo ewo Israe̩l le̩.
